name: New Hangman Phrase Free - Happy Hang Man Challenged Gaming App(Phrase Version)
name_original: New Hangman Phrase Free - Happy Hang Man Challenged Gaming App(Phrase Version)
description:
Hangman Phrase is a guessing game for two or more players. One player thinks of a word, phrase or sentence and the other tries to guess it by suggesting letters or numbers.

The phrase to guess is represented by a row of dashes, representing each letter of the word. phrase you cannot use include proper nouns such as names, places, and brands. If the guessing player suggests a letter which occurs in the word, the other player writes it in all its correct positions. If the suggested letter or number does not occur in the word, the other player draws one element of a hanged man stick figure as a tally mark.

Have Fun!!
